entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 11:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
